desc.en: The Night Tube and London Overground Night Service, often referred to simply as Night Tube, is a service pattern on the London Underground ("Tube") and London Overground systems which provides through-the-night services on Friday and Saturday nights on the Central, Jubilee, Northern, Piccadilly, and Victoria lines, and a short section of the London Overground's Windrush line.
desc.zh-Hans: 夜间地铁和伦敦地上铁夜间服务，通常简称为夜间地铁，是伦敦地铁（“地铁”）和伦敦地上铁系统的一种服务模式，在中央线、银禧线、北线、皮卡迪利线和维多利亚线以及伦敦地上铁Windrush 线的一小段上提供周五和周六晚上的通宵服务。

updateHistory.reason: New template of London Night Tube
